title: Isshun no Kaze ni Nare - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   School Life   Shounen   Slice of Life   Sports
author: Satou Takako
description: Shinji's older brother is a talented soccer player. Feeling somewhat overshadowed by his brother's success, Shinji joins the athletics club with his best friend who is, just his luck, a very promising sprinter. Divided into three parts, 'Ready', 'Get Set', and 'Go', the story follows the growth of the main characters over three years.>
